name: AGAR2600
description:
Space exploration takes time, but humans don't last long enough. That's just why the AGAR2600 was developed! It allows terran researchers to outsource their fieldwork, avoiding the inherent risks of intergalactic discovery. Through the P20  extraction probe, it is possible to transport microorganisms 'in vitro' for light years before their DNA starts deteriorating by collisions with charged particles.

All this from the comfort of your lab!

Try our product's control terminal today and receive a special discount coupon for remote probe refills!

 The first version of this game was made in a 72 hours Jam (Jamingtons 6) by "Teamnonymous", that was:

  • Matheus René (@sup3rn0va_art)  - game design, graphics and animations
  •  Wilgnne K. - game design and software development
  • Thayllor S. - game design and software development
  • Mathias A. - game design and software development
  • Everson M. - game design, software development and SFX
